00102 class ff_FILE_sink
00103 {
00104 public: // Member Types
00105 
00106 public: // Construction
00109     explicit ff_FILE_sink(
00110         FILE* stm
00111     )
00112         : stream(stm)
00113     {}
00114 private:
00115     ff_FILE_sink& operator =(ff_FILE_sink const&);
00116 
00117 public: // Fields
00119     FILE* const stream;
00120 };

00136 ff_FILE_sink
00137 to_sink(FILE* stm)
00138 {
00139     return ff_FILE_sink(stm);
00140 }

00142 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00143  * Action Shims
00144  */
00145 
00165 inline
00166 FILE*&
00167 fmt_slices(
00168     FILE*&                      sink
00169 ,   int                         flags
00170 ,   size_t                      cchTotal
00171 ,   size_t                      numResults
00172 ,   ff_string_slice_t const*    results
00173 )
00174 {
00175 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_FILE_SINK_OLD_IMPLEMENTATION
00176     stlsoft::auto_buffer<ff_char_t> buff(cchTotal + 1 + 1); // 1 for \0, 1 for newline (if needed)
00177 #else /* ? !FASTFORMAT_FILE_SINK_OLD_IMPLEMENTATION */
00178     stlsoft::auto_buffer<ff_char_t> buff(cchTotal);
00179 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_FILE_SINK_OLD_IMPLEMENTATION */
00180     int                             n = 0;
00181 
00182 # ifndef STLSOFT_CF_THROW_BAD_ALLOC
00183     if(!buff.empty())
00184 # endif /* !STLSOFT_CF_THROW_BAD_ALLOC */
00185     {
00186 # if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00187         using ::fastformat::util::concat_slices;
00188 # endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00189 
00190 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_FILE_SINK_OLD_IMPLEMENTATION
00191 
00192         size_t n2 = concat_slices(buff, numResults, results);
00193         if(flags::ff_newLine & flags)
00194         {
00195             buff[n2++] = '\n';
00196         }
00197         buff[n2++] = '\0';
00198 
00199 # ifdef FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS
00200         n = ::fputws(
00201 # else /* ? FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS */
00202         n = ::fputs(
00203 # endif /* FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS */
00204             buff.data()
00205         ,   sink
00206         );
00207 
00208 #else /* ? !FASTFORMAT_FILE_SINK_OLD_IMPLEMENTATION */
00209 
00210         concat_slices(buff, numResults, results);
00211 
00212 # ifdef FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS
00213         n = ::fwprintf(
00214 # else /* ? FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS */
00215         n = ::fprintf(
00216 # endif /* FASTFORMAT_USE_WIDE_STRINGS */
00217             sink
00218         ,   (flags::ff_newLine & flags) ? FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("%.*s\n") : FASTFORMAT_LITERAL_STRING("%.*s")
00219         ,   static_cast<int>(cchTotal), buff.data()
00220         );
00221 
00222 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_FILE_SINK_OLD_IMPLEMENTATION */
00223     }
00224 
00225     if( n >= 0 &&
00226         0 != (flags::ff_flush & flags))
00227     {
00228         if(0 != ::fflush(sink))
00229         {
00230             n = -1;
00231         }
00232     }
00233 
00234     if(n < 0)
00235     {
00236 #ifdef STLSOFT_CF_EXCEPTION_SUPPORT
00237         // TODO: Use more-derived exception and capture errno
00238         throw sink_output_exception("Failed to write/flush statement");
00239 #endif /* STLSOFT_CF_EXCEPTION_SUPPORT */
00240     }
00241 
00242     return sink;
00243 }
00244 
00245 
00250 inline
00251 ff_FILE_sink&
00252 fmt_slices(
00253     ff_FILE_sink&               sink
00254 ,   int                         flags
00255 ,   size_t                      cchTotal
00256 ,   size_t                      numResults
00257 ,   ff_string_slice_t const*    results
00258 )
00259 {
00260     FILE* stm = sink.stream;
00261 
00262     fmt_slices(stm, flags, cchTotal, numResults, results);
00263 
00264     return sink;
00265 }
